div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 63 Eretria environs, Euboea, before 1855 (398) Burial: c. 350-340 B.C. (T) Contents: 48 AV Philip II: 2 st. Philippi: 10 st. Persia: 36 darics Disposition: unknown Lambros, Sur six médailles d'or inédites de Philippi (Corfu, 1855), line drawings
